text: Chisimu wandu waakwatyosyaga Achimalaika mitima jao (pa kuwa) ali walitenda lupuso achimisyene (pangasama pa Maaka), akwawechetaga kuti: “Mukawechi mwaliji?” Wanganyao akutiji: “Twaliji wangalikombolela (ni wakuwanidwa) pa chilambo.” (Achimalaika) akutiji: “Ana chilambo cha Allah nganichiwa chakusapanguka mwanti jenumanja nikomboleka kusamila (kwine) mwalakwemo?” Basi wanganyao mauto gao ni Jahannama, kaje kunyalaya malo gakuwujila gakwe
